name: Shadow of Blood
description:
Shadow of Blood is a side-scrolling beat 'em up wher the player impersonates a human recently turned into a vampire, without knowing who transformed him.

In the game the player will face hordes of enemies that will try to stop him.

This game was developed as part of the World of Darkness Unbound initiative as an assignment for Event Horizon.

Game Design:
Amedeo Favi
Francesco "ProjectF" Cocino

Game Programming:
Luca Sandrone
Simone Bernobich
Lorenzo Ponzo

Concept Art:
Mirko Briguglio

3D Art:
Daniele Summa
